# RegularExpressionHelper.IsValidEmailAddress method

Determines whether *value* is valid mail address.

```csharp
public static bool IsValidEmailAddress(string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Mail address to check. |

## Return Value

true if mail address is valid; otherwise, false.
